text: Motion
Motion
Motion
────……sigh
Alright, onto the next one...

Ah, Asahi, is that...
the dance video you borrowed from the trainer?
Yep, that's right~

Wow, there's so much...
It seems like it would be tough to watch it all.
I've finished about half of it already.

Are you going to keep watching? You've been
concentrating for quite a while. Let's take a break.

I'm fine.
I want to keep watching.

You don't have to watch it all at once...
You could watch it at home...
Hmm, I might lose it if I take it home.

I see...
Well, you can watch it here then...

But staring at the screen for too long isn't good,
so let's do something else in between, alright?
Yeah, that sounds good. If it's something else.
Well... Alright.
Let's review what we've watched!
Huh, now?

Yeah,
but this place is a bit cramped.
Let's go to the rooftop~!

O-Okay...!
But let's not overdo it...!

...Asahi,
it's about time to call it quits.
...Producer-san.

...*sigh*
I'm pretty tired...
It's tough, huh? There's so much to remember...
You don't have to remember everything, you know?
Huh?
I was just given it as a reference.

But I didn't know what to reference,
so I decided to try it out myself!

I see...
I thought it was an assignment for sure.

Asahi is always so diligent about her studies,
isn't she...
...Studies?

Yeah, 
she's always trying to absorb as much as she can.

Hmm...?
I just wanted to try it out because it caught my interest.
You don't know until you try, you know?

So that's it...
Did you figure something out?
Yes!
If you want, I can tell you.

Please do.
───Um...
I'm not sure what to say.

Let me try something real quick.
Please watch!
Haha... Sure.
